name: tcdynamics-workspace
description: TCDynamics WorkFlowAI - AI-powered automation platform for French SMEs

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:functions
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:functions && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:functions: cd apps/functions && func azure functionapp publish
